name: .HAL File Extension
summary: Learn about .HAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by HansaWorld ERP system Enterprise, an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) application; contains program code written in the HansaWorld Application Language (HAL); used to create customized components, such as business reports and database forms.

content: HAL files are commonly found within the Halcust directory of a HansaWorld ERP system Enterprise installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
